headline: Ron DeSantis says if Stacey Abrams wins election it will create a Florida-Georgia 'cold war'
sentences: "If Stacey Abrams is elected governor of Georgia, I just want to be honest, that will be a cold war between Florida and Georgia," DeSantis said at a press conference about infrastructure, according to The Hill.
